definitions.definition: A tendency to talk excessively about oneself.
A belief that one is superior to or more important than others.
The result or product of being egoistic .
Egoism ( belief that behavior should be directed towards one's self-interest ) .
labels: by confusion of the similar words
definitions.label_groups: nonstandard , by confusion of the similar words

main_definition: A tendency to talk excessively about oneself.
secondary_definitions: A belief that one is superior to or more important than others.
( countable ) The result or product of being egoistic .
( nonstandard , by confusion of the similar words ) Egoism ( belief that behavior should be directed towards one's self-interest ) .
